mapper.sql: SELECT STORE_NO, STORE_WRITERNO, STORE_KORNAME, STORE_ENGNAME, STORE_ZIPCODE, STORE_ADDRESS1, STORE_ADDRESS2, STORE_PHONE, STORE_TIME, STORE_TYPE, STORE_STATUS, STORE_CONTENT, STORE_CONTENT2, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM BBN_STORE WHERE STORE_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select:
AND STORE_TYPE = #{shCate}
AND STORE_ADDRESS1 LIKE '%' || #{shRegionD1} || '%'
AND STORE_KORNAME LIKE '%' || #{shKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY STORE_NO DESC
SELECT S_FILE_NO, STORE_NO, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME FROM STORE_FILE WHERE STORE_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBN_STORE ( STORE_NO, STORE_WRITERNO, STORE_KORNAME, STORE_ENGNAME, STORE_ZIPCODE, STORE_ADDRESS1, STORE_ADDRESS2, STORE_PHONE, STORE_TIME, STORE_TYPE, STORE_STATUS, STORE_CONTENT, STORE_CONTENT2, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_STORE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{writerNo}, #{korBname}, #{engBname}, #{zipCode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{phone}, #{bnsHour}, #{type}, DEFAULT, #{content}, #{content2}, #{originalFileName}, #{renamedFileName}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO STORE_FILE ( S_FILE_NO, STORE_NO, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_S_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{shopNo}, #{file_originalFileName}, #{file_renamedFileName} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE BBN_STORE
STORE_KORNAME = #{korBname},
STORE_ENGNAME = #{engBname},
STORE_ZIPCODE = #{zipCode},
STORE_ADDRESS1 = #{address1},
STORE_ADDRESS2 = #{address2},
STORE_PHONE = #{phone},
STORE_TYPE = #{type},
STORE_CONTENT = #{content},
STORE_CONTENT2 = #{content2},
